pr_title: Allow Repository Plugins to Filter Metadata on Create

timeline.message:
Allow Repository Plugins to Filter Metadata on Create

Add a hook that allows repository plugins to filter the repository metadata
before it gets written to the cluster state.

timeline.bodyText: Let's mark this part as WIP, we can do a nicer thing so that in the e.g. cat repo list the type is correctly displayed for the source only repo (could just do this via an override to the getMetaData on the source only repo), I'd just like to get confirmation of the approach before doing that :)
timeline.author: original-brownbear

timeline.message: add snapshot user meta as param
pass user meta to shard snapshot

timeline.bodyText: Bit of a complicated test for a simple thing like this but I didn't want to add this on top of other already complicated snapshot tests.
